en-IN.summary: I am Sonpari. I tell new stories every day. Kids love me.
en-IN.name: Sonpari Tales
en-IN.description: I am Sonpari. I tell new stories every day. But I talk with only good kids. I ask them questions and tell new stories every day. This skill helps to develop basic moral values in children.  E.g. It can tell kids that we should not tell a lie etc.
